name: Fast Running Super Hero Free - Endless Runner
name_original: Fast Running Super Hero Free - Endless Runner
description:
An iPhone 4, iPad 1 or higher is recommended, for the full game experience.

Take control of our Fast Running Super Hero and control him across a breathtaking skyscraper landscape.

A never-ending game with new and varying levels. React quickly and try to survive!

CONTROL:

* The Fast Running Super Hero starts to run
* Touch anywhere on the screen to jump
* Touch longer for higher jumps

FEATURES:

* One-touch jump&run platform game
* New levels with increasing difficulty
* Collect coins to beat the high-score
* Combat different enemies and fight them
* Amazing skyline atmosphere with music and sound effects

The free edition can be played up to level 12.

Fast Running Super Hero is a co-production of adrastea and alpine republic.

If you enjoy the game please rate it and recommend it to your friends. Only then can we continue to develop the game and provide you with further amazing features.
